cells.data:
Generic IMA events has been released and is available:
CSS: http://players.brightcove.net/videojs-ima3/2/videojs.ima3.min.css
Javascript: http://players.brightcove.net/videojs-ima3/2/videojs.ima3.min.js
SWF: http://players.brightcove.net/videojs-ima3/2/videojs.ima3.swf
This version of IMA is only compatible with the Brightcove Player 2.0.0+, currently available in "Early Access" only. We are working to finish the remaining compatibility work to get all of our customers onto the 2.x version of the Brightcove Player but don't have an exact date yet.
